addemoji.name: addemoji
addemoji.description: Add an emoji to the Discord

logs.name: logs
logs.description: displays the activated / deactivated logs of the discord

massadd.name: massadd
massadd.description: Adds a role to all members

massremove.name: massremove
massremove.description: Remove a role from all members

rolereaction.name: rolereaction
rolereaction.description: Click on an emoji to have a role

security.name: security
security.description: Displays the security of the discord

vocal.name: vocal
vocal.description: Displays the number of people in voice on the discord

color.name: color
color.description: Choose the color of the bot's embeds

sanction.name: sanction
sanction.description: Choose the sanction of the security commands

language.name: language
language.description: Choose the language of the bot

tempvocal.name: tempvocal
tempvocal.description: Sets up the temporary voice system

soutien.name: soutien
soutien.description: Choose the message and the role of the support command

setup.name: setup
setup.description: Create the categories, channels and roles needed for the bot to function properly

setlogs.name: setlogs
setlogs.description: Choose the logs channel of the bot

avatar.name: avatar
avatar.description: Gives the avatar of the person mentioned

resetwarn.name: resetwarns
resetwarn.description: Reset the warnings of a member

rolecheck.name: rolecheck
rolecheck.description: Displays the number of people who have a role

owner.name: owner
owner.description: Add, delete, list of users owners

botinfo.name: botinfo
botinfo.description: Allows to have information on the bot discord

warnings.name: warnings
warnings.description: Displays the number of warns of the mentioned person

userinfo.name: userinfo
userinfo.description: Sends information about the mentioned user (or you)

deletewebhooks.name: deletewebhooks
deletewebhooks.description: Delete all webhooks from the Discord

logsc.name: logsc
logsc.description: Activate / desactivate the creation / deletion logs of the channels

logsjoin.name: logsjoin
logsjoin.description: Enable / Disable join and leave logs

logsmsg.name: logsmsg
logsmsg.description: Enable / disable message deletion / modification logs

setavatar.name: setavatar
setavatar.perms: `OWNER (from Discord)`, `OWNERS (chosen with command)`, `Owner from personal bot`

setusername.name: setusername
setusername.description: Choose the name of the bot
setusername.perms: `OWNER (from Discord)`, `OWNERS (chosen with command)`, `Owner from personal bot`

statut.name: statut
statut.description: Choose the message in status and the bot activity
statut.perms: `OWNER (from Discord)`, `OWNERS (chosen with command)`, `Owner from personal bot`

serverlist.name: serverlist
serverlist.description: Displays the bot's servers, possibility to make them leave

antiw.name: antiw
antiw.description: Add, delete, list of blacklisted words
